Hms.model:

*LoginContrl.Java*

//ç™»å½•æ§åˆ¶

package hms.model;

import java.sql.*;

import hms.util.DBUtil;

public class LoginControl {

public static boolean isAdmin;

public static int id;

//éªŒè¯å¯†ç 

public static boolean LoginCheck(boolean isAdmin, int id, String password) throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException {

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT password FROM ";

â€‹ if (!isAdmin) {

â€‹ SQL = SQL + "user where uid = " + id;

â€‹ } else {

â€‹ isAdmin = true;

â€‹ SQL = SQL + "admin where aid = " + id;

â€‹ }

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ if (!resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ try {

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ } catch (Exception e) {

â€‹ e.printStackTrace();

â€‹ }

â€‹ return false;

â€‹ } else if (!resultSet.getObject("password").equals(password)) {

â€‹ try {

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ } catch (Exception e) {

â€‹ e.printStackTrace();

â€‹ }

â€‹ return false;

â€‹ }

â€‹ try {

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ } catch (Exception e) {

â€‹ e.printStackTrace();

â€‹ }

â€‹ LoginControl.id = id;

â€‹ try {

â€‹ ReadInformation();

â€‹ } catch (Exception e) {

â€‹ e.printStackTrace();

â€‹ }

â€‹ System.out.println("\nSucesss!\nisAdmin:" + isAdmin + "\nid:" + LoginControl.id);

â€‹ return true;

}

//ä¿¡æ¯è¯»å…¥

public static void ReadInformation() throws Exception {

â€‹ if (isAdmin) {

â€‹ } else {

â€‹ User.userInformationRead(id);

â€‹ }

}

}

*Seat.Java*

//é¤å°ç®¡ç†

package hms.model;

import java.sql.*;

import hms.util.DBUtil;

public class Seat {

public static int[] SID = new int[100];

public static int[] Anum = new int[100];

public static int[] State = new int[100];

public static int USID;

public static int UAnum;

//åº§ä½è·å–

public static void getSeats() throws Exception {

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT * FROM seat";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ for (int i = 1; resultSet.next(); i++) {

â€‹ SID[i] = resultSet.getInt("SID");

â€‹ Anum[i] = resultSet.getInt("Anum");

â€‹ State[i] = resultSet.getInt("State");

â€‹ }

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

}

//å‰©ä½™åº§ä½é‡è·å–

public static int remainingSeats(int Anum) throws Exception {

â€‹ int num = 0;

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT * FROM seat where Anum =";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + " " + Anum;

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ while (resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ if(resultSet.getInt("State") == 0) {

â€‹ num++;

â€‹ }

â€‹ }

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ return num;

}

//ç¡®è®¤åº§ä½

public static boolean SeatConfirm() throws Exception {

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT * FROM seat WHERE Anum = ";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + UAnum + " AND State = 0";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ resultSet.next();

â€‹ try {

â€‹ USID = resultSet.getInt("SID");

â€‹ } catch (Exception e) {

â€‹ return false;

â€‹ }

â€‹ String SQL2 = "UPDATE seat SET State = 1 WHERE SID = ";

â€‹ SQL2 = SQL2 + USID;

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL2);

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ return true;

}

//åº§ä½çŠ¶æ€æ›´æ”¹

public static void StateChange(int State,int SID) throws Exception {

â€‹ String SQL = "UPDATE seat SET State = ";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + State +" WHERE SID = "+ SID;

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL);

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

}

}

*Food.Java*

//èœå“ç®¡ç†

package hms.model;

import java.sql.ResultSet;

import javax.swing.ImageIcon;

import hms.util.DBUtil;

import hms.view.OrderFrame;

public class Food {

//èœåè·å–

public static String[] getFoodsName(String Class) throws Exception {

â€‹ String[] list = new String[20];

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT FName FROM Food WHERE Class like '";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + Class +"'";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ for (int i = 0; resultSet.next(); i++) {

â€‹ list[i] = resultSet.getString("FName");

â€‹ }

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ return list;

}

//èœå“å›¾ç‰‡è¯»å…¥

public static ImageIcon getIcon(int FID) {

â€‹ try {

â€‹ ImageIcon testtt = new ImageIcon(OrderFrame.class.getResource("/img/" + FID + ".jpg"));

â€‹ } catch (Exception e) {

â€‹ return null;

â€‹ }

â€‹ ImageIcon icon = new ImageIcon(OrderFrame.class.getResource("/img/" + FID + ".jpg"));

â€‹ return icon;

}

public static int CFid = 1;

public static String CFName = "çº¢çƒ§è‚‰";

public static float CFPrice = (float) 18.00;

public static int CFInventory = 35;

public static int allPrice = 0;

//èœå“é€‰æ‹©

public static void foodChoose(String FName) throws Exception {

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT * FROM Food WHERE FName like '";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + FName +"'";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ while (resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ CFid = resultSet.getInt("FID");

â€‹ CFName = resultSet.getString("FName");

â€‹ CFPrice = resultSet.getInt("Price");

â€‹ CFInventory = resultSet.getInt("Inventory");

â€‹ }

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

}

public static String[] orderStrings = new String[20];

public static int listNum = 0;

//èœå•æ·»åŠ èœå“

public static void addFood() {

â€‹ orderStrings[listNum] = CFName;

â€‹ listNum++;

â€‹ allPrice += CFPrice;

}

}

*Order.Java*

//è®¢å•ç®¡ç†

package hms.model;

import java.sql.ResultSet;

import hms.util.DBUtil;

public class Order {

public static int OID;

//åˆ›å»ºè®¢å•

public static void creatOrder() throws Exception {

â€‹ int lastOID = 0;

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT OID FROM order ORDER BY OID";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ while (resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ lastOID = resultSet.getInt(1);

â€‹ }

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ System.out.println(lastOID);

â€‹ OID = lastOID + 1;

â€‹ String SQL2 = "INSERT INTO order (OID,isPay,SID) VALUES ('";

â€‹ SQL2 = SQL2 + OID + "','0','" + Seat.USID + "')";

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL2);

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

}

public static int OMID;

//ä¸Šä¼ è®¢å•å’Œèœå•

public static void updateOrder() throws Exception {

â€‹ int lastOMID = 0;

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT OMID FROM ordermenu ORDER BY OMID";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ while (resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ lastOMID = resultSet.getInt(1);

â€‹ }

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ System.out.println(lastOMID);

â€‹ OMID = lastOMID + 1;

â€‹ for (int i = 0; Food.orderStrings[i] != null; i++) {

â€‹ int FID = 0;

â€‹ String SQL3 = "SELECT FID FROM Food WHERE FName like '";

â€‹ SQL3 = SQL3 + Food.orderStrings[i] + "'";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet2 = DBUtil.query(SQL3);

â€‹ while (resultSet2.next()) {

â€‹ FID = resultSet2.getInt("FID");

â€‹ }

â€‹ String SQL2 = "INSERT INTO ordermenu (OMID,FID,OID) VALUES ('";

â€‹ SQL2 = SQL2 + OMID + "','" + FID + "','" + OID + "')";

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL2);

â€‹ OMID++;

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ }

â€‹ String SQL4 = "UPDATE order SET Price =";

â€‹ SQL4 = SQL4 + Food.allPrice + " WHERE OID = " + OID;

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL4);

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

}

//ç»“ç®—å¤„ç†

public static void payDeal() throws Exception {

â€‹ String SQL = "UPDATE order SET isPay = 1 WHERE OID = ";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + OID;

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL);

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

â€‹ String SQL2 = "UPDATE user SET Point = Point + ";

â€‹ SQL2 = SQL2 + Food.allPrice + " WHERE UID = " + User.UID;

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL2);

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

}

//æ ¹æ®è®¢å•å·è·å–åº§ä½å·

public static int getSID(int OID) throws Exception {

â€‹ int SID = 0;

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT SID FROM order where OID = ";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + OID;

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ while (resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ SID = resultSet.getInt(1);

â€‹ }

â€‹ return SID;

}

//è®¢å•åˆ é™¤

public static void OrderDelet(int OID) throws Exception {

â€‹ String SQL = "DELETE FROM order WHERE OID = ";

â€‹ SQL = SQL + OID;

â€‹ DBUtil.update(SQL);

â€‹ DBUtil.closeConnection();

}

//è·å–æ€»è¥ä¸šé¢

public static float getTotalTurnover() throws Exception {

â€‹ float TotalTurnover = 0;

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT Price From order";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ while (resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ TotalTurnover += resultSet.getFloat(1);

â€‹ }

â€‹ return TotalTurnover;

}

//è·å–æ€»é”€é‡

public static int getTotalSales() throws Exception {

â€‹ int TotalSales = 0;

â€‹ String SQL = "SELECT OMID From ordermenu";

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = DBUtil.query(SQL);

â€‹ while (resultSet.next()) {

â€‹ TotalSales++;

â€‹ }

â€‹ return TotalSales;

}

}

5.4 æ•°æ®åº“ä»£ç 

Hms.util

*DBUtil.Java*

//æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ä¸æ“ä½œçš„æŠ½è±¡

package hms.util;

import java.sql.*;

public class DBUtil {

public static final String DBDRIVER = "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver";

public static final String DBURL = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/resmsc?useSSL=false&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8";

public static final String DBUSER = "LNTU_DDC";

public static final String DBPASS = "jtcsm";

public static Connection connection = null;

//è·å–å¹¶è¿”å›è¿æ¥

public static Connection getConnection() throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException {

â€‹ Connection con = null;

â€‹ try {

â€‹ Class.forName(DBDRIVER);

â€‹ } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {

â€‹ e.printStackTrace();

â€‹ }

â€‹ try {

â€‹ con = DriverManager.getConnection(DBURL, DBUSER, DBPASS);

â€‹ } catch (SQLException e) {

â€‹ e.printStackTrace();

â€‹ }

â€‹ System.out.println("connect to db");

â€‹ return con;

}

//æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥æ‰¾

public static ResultSet query(String sql) throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException {

â€‹ connection = getConnection();

â€‹ Statement statement = connection.createStatement();

â€‹ ResultSet resultSet = statement.executeQuery(sql);

â€‹ return resultSet;

}

//æ•°æ®åº“æ›´æ–°

public static int update(String sql) throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException {

â€‹ connection = getConnection();

â€‹ Statement statement = connection.createStatement();

â€‹ int UpdateLine = statement.executeUpdate(sql);

â€‹ return UpdateLine;

}

//å…³é—­è¿æ¥

public static void closeConnection() throws Exception {

â€‹ connection.close();

}

}

SQL****å»ºè¡¨è¯­å¥

Admin

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS admin;

CREATE TABLE admin (

AID int(2) NOT NULL,

AName varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL,

Password varchar(30) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL,

Tele char(11) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL,

PRIMARY KEY (AID) USING BTREE

) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

Food

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS food;

CREATE TABLE food (

FID int(4) NOT NULL,

FName varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL,

Class varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL,

Price decimal(5, 2) NULL DEFAULT NULL,

Inventory int(5) NULL DEFAULT NULL,

PRIMARY KEY (FID) USING BTREE

) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

Order

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS order;

CREATE TABLE order (

OID int(10) NOT NULL,

Note varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL,

Price decimal(10, 2) NULL DEFAULT NULL,

isPay int(1) NOT NULL,

SID int(3) NULL DEFAULT NULL,

PRIMARY KEY (OID) USING BTREE,

INDEX SID(SID) USING BTREE,

CONSTRAINT SID FOREIGN KEY (SID) REFERENCES seat (SID) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE RESTRICT

) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

Ordermenu

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ordermenu;

CREATE TABLE ordermenu (

OMID int(10) NOT NULL,

FID int(4) NULL DEFAULT NULL,

OID int(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL,

PRIMARY KEY (OMID) USING BTREE,

INDEX FID(FID) USING BTREE,

INDEX OID(OID) USING BTREE,

CONSTRAINT FID FOREIGN KEY (FID) REFERENCES food (FID) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE RESTRICT,

CONSTRAINT OID FOREIGN KEY (OID) REFERENCES order (OID) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE RESTRICT

) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

Seat

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS seat;

CREATE TABLE seat (

SID int(3) NOT NULL,

Anum int(2) NOT NULL,

State int(1) NOT NULL,

PRIMARY KEY (SID) USING BTREE

) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;

User

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS user;

CREATE TABLE user (

UID int(10) NOT NULL,

UName varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL,

Password varchar(30) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL,

Tele char(11) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL,

Point int(20) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT NULL,

PRIMARY KEY (UID) USING BTREE

) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;
